Rmarkdown

Source: vignettes/actions.Rmd
actions.Rmd

To include a chart in Rmarkdown simply place the code in a code chunk.

g2(beaver1, asp(time, temp)) %>% 
  fig_line() %>% 
  fig_point(asp(shape = "circle"))

Button

One can also include “actions” in Rmarkdown documents, these are some elements of dynamism.

g2(mtcars, asp(mpg, qsec), elementId = "plotty") %>% 
  fig_point(config("hello"))
input_button("Update", "Update chart")

g2_action("plotty", "toggler", asp(mpg), data = mtcars) %>% 
  fig_point(asp(y = drat, shape = "circle")) %>% 
  fig_point(asp(y = wt, shape = "circle"), config("hello")) %>% 
  render()
